com.iutdijon.androiut2.util.zoom.util
Class Dynamics

java.lang.Object
  com.iutdijon.androiut2.util.zoom.util.Dynamics
Direct Known Subclasses:
SpringDynamics
public abstract class Dynamics
extends Object

Utility class used to handle flinging within a specified limit.

Dynamics

public Dynamics()
Method Detail

setState

public void setState(double d,
                     double e,
                     long now)
Sets the state of the dynamics object. Should be called before starting to call update.

Parameters:
d - The current position.
e - The current velocity in pixels per second.
now - The current time

getPosition

public double getPosition()
Returns the current position. Normally used after a call to update() in order to get the updated position.

Returns:
The current position

getVelocity

public double getVelocity()
Gets the velocity. Unit is in pixels per second.

Returns:
The velocity in pixels per second

isAtRest

public boolean isAtRest(double velocityTolerance,
                        double positionTolerance)
Used to find out if the list is at rest, that is, has no velocity and is inside the the limits. Normally used to know if more calls to update are needed.

Parameters:
velocityTolerance - Velocity is regarded as 0 if less than velocityTolerance
positionTolerance - Position is regarded as inside the limits even if positionTolerance above or below
Returns:
true if list is at rest, false otherwise

setMaxPosition

public void setMaxPosition(double mPanMaxX)
Sets the maximum position.

Parameters:
mPanMaxX - The maximum value of the position

setMinPosition

public void setMinPosition(double minPosition)
Sets the minimum position.

Parameters:
minPosition - The minimum value of the position

update

public void update(long now)
Updates the position and velocity.

Parameters:
now - The current time
